meanings.definition: The process of creating a high-gloss finish on a material, typically a photograph, by pressing it against a heated metal plate.
meanings.sent1: Ferrotyping gives photographs a shiny look.
meanings.sent2: The artist used ferrotyping to make the picture glossy.
meanings.sent3: When the photographer tried ferrotyping, the photo ended up looking like a mirror!
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the photo was so clear, it seemed like ferrotyping captured her happiness forever.
meanings.sent5: The ferrotyping process made the image gleam like a polished gem.

meanings.definition: To produce a ferrotype image using the ferrotyping process.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys ferrotyping her pictures for a professional touch.
meanings.sent2: They decided to ferrotype the photograph to enhance its appearance.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally ferrotyped the wrong picture, creating a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Ferrotyping the memory made it stand out vividly in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist's skill in ferrotyping brought out the beauty in every image.
